Estimate Dispersion Parameters for Count Matrix

Source: R/overdispersion.R
estimate_dispersion.Rd

Calculates per-gene dispersion estimates for a count matrix using a method of moments approach. Handles edge cases by setting a default high dispersion value.

Usage

estimate_dispersion(count_matrix, offset_vector)

Arguments

count_matrix

Matrix of count data with genes in rows and samples in columns

offset_vector

Vector of offset values for normalization

Value

Vector of dispersion estimates, one per gene
